nodes.text: Zone 12 was a private heavily fortified shipyards located in the Blastfield Shipyards of the Coronet City on Corellia. During the Battle of Corellia an Escape pod from Imperial Harrower-class dreadnought Javelin containing a member of Barsen'thor's crew landed in Zone 12, which was then overrun by Imperials. Using information provided by Captain Drizan and his Selonian ally Quil, Barsen'thor stormed Zone 12 and rescued his companion.
Zone 12 appears as an area on Corellia in the 2011 video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
